class.name: GDScriptErrorChecker
class.brief_description: Tool to check for errors on GDScript source code.
class.description:
[GDScriptErrorChecker] takes the source code of a GDScript file and runs it through the GDScript parser in order to expose any error it finds.
The parser only reports the first error it runs into.

method.name: get_error
method.description: Returns the message for the current error.

method.name: get_error_column
method.description: Returns the column on the line the error happened.

method.name: get_error_line
method.description: Returns the line the error happened.

method.name: has_error
method.description: Returns whether or not the parser found an error.

method.name: set_source
method.description: Sets the source code and runs it through the parser. This is necessary for the other functions to run.
